Risk Description: Unauthorized access to sensitive data
Critical system goes offline unexpectedly
Employees tricked into revealing info
Employee misuses access to harm company
Malware software infects system
Equipment or data is stolen physically
Systems missing security updates
Vendor or partner suffers a data breach
Earth quake, flood or fire damage facilities
Loss of electricity disrupts operations
Accidental or intentional deletion of data
Attackers trick staff into giving info
Systems setting up incorrectly, creating vulnerabilities
Cyberattack targets vendors or suppliers
Someone gains access without permission
Phones, laptops or USBs containing data lost or stolen
Users use simple or weak passwords
Poorly designed interfaces expose data
Slow or weak response to security incidents
Staff not trained on security policies and risks
